title: Basics of Computers & Code in iOS
headline: In this free online course, learn about the fundamentals of computer science, code and binary through iOS Development.
description: This free online programming course will teach you about the core fundamentals of computing, code and binary work with an eye towards iOS app development. iOS app development and programming are extremely valuable skills and iOS developers are in high-demand today. This course is perfect for anyone interested in iOS app development as a career or for those who wish to gain a thorough understanding of computer coding.
courseDescription:
This course explains at a fundamental level how computers, code and binary work. The course also offers learners beginning iOS development the ability to understand how applications are developed by building a working iOS app.

The course begins by explaining the binary system and how binary code works in computers. You will then develop an actual iOS application that converts between decimal and binary. In this course, you will not only learn the fundamentals of computing but also how to apply that knowledge in creating an iOS app. This course provides a perfect starting point for anyone beginning iOS development and who wants a deeper understanding of how computers work.

 

If youâ€™re interested in iOS app development as a career, or simply want a core understanding of computer coding, then this clear and simple course is the one for you. Programming is a key skill in the world today, so having a thorough knowledge of binary code can help give you that edge over other developers and kickstart your career in iOS development. So, why wait? Start learning how to become an iOS app developer today!

Start Course Now

All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
